newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Vitarich says will show profit next year.
newsitem.headline: Vitarich says will show profit next year.

text.p: Poultry and feeds producer Vitarich Corp said on Thursday it expected to post a profit in 1997 after undergoing corporate restructuring this year.

"We have implemented a whole programme of corrective measures that have begun to show positive results this year and are confident that we will be fully back on the profit level by next year," Vitarich chairman Rogelio Sarmiento said in a statement.
The company showed a 571.225 million peso loss in the first nine months of 1996 due to oversupply of chicken, its main product. The loss followed a 280.256 million peso net profit in all of 1995.
The statement did not give any forecasts for 1996 losses and company officials were not immediately available for comment.

Vitarich had reduced production levels, cut down on manpower and deferred major capital expenditures, except for the expansion of three feedmills and a corn silo just north of Manila, the company said without elaborating.
